column2: How do you do, George, he said.
column3: How do you do, George, he said.

column2: Or try the side door--or the kitchen!
column3: Or try the side door-or the kitchen!

column2: Did you have plenty to eat?
column3: Did you have plenty to eat?

column2: You have been investing! and as she came across the room for a closer view, "Is it--is it Lucy?" she asked half timidly, half archly.
column3: You have been investing! and as she came across the room for a closer view, "Is it-is it Lucy?" she asked half timidly, half archly.
